data.name: PARADISE
data.detailed_description:
TPS Cyberpunk Adventure Game.
Players become Treasure Hunter Alice and experience small adventures in a uniquely level-designed cyberpunk town.

Story

A planet discovered by the space fleet of the Earth Federation.
There was a town there, but there was no vital reaction.
Fearing human damage, the Earth Federation opened the area to treasure hunters.
Alice decided to go to the city named PARADISE-CITY as one of the treasure hunters.

Controls

Move: W, A, S, D
Run: Shift key
Jump: Space key
​Draw the weapon: E
Reload: R
​Aim at the enemy: Right Mouse Click
​Attack the enemy: Left mouse click
​Pause, Inventory, Save/Load, and Quest Journal: ESC
​-When skills are available-
​Use the skills: Numeric Keys
Skill power charge: Hold down the shift key

data.short_description: TPS Cyberpunk Adventure Game. What will Treasure Hunter Alice see on a planet with only robots?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (7th) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The main character shoots people or things with a gun.
(There's no bloodshed, no Gore, no grotesque scenes.)
